# Test Post

Just a test

```{r cars}
dat <- MASS::mvrnorm(100, c(x = 0, y = 0), matrix(c(1, .8, .8, 1), 2, 2))
cor.test(dat[, "x"], dat[, "y"])
```

# Test Plot

This is an plot. See Figure \@ref(fig:fig1):

```{r fig1, fig.cap = 'A test figure', tidy = FALSE}
psych::pairs.panels(dat)
```
